solution.text:
According to scale, 1 cm in the map = _{j}_ m actual distance.
Thus, _{{j*100}}_ cm = 1 cm on the map
\(\Rightarrow \) Therefore, _{k}_m shown on map, actual distance = _{k}_ x _{{100*j}}_ m = _{{Decimal(k)*j/(10)}}_ km.

content.text: The scale on a map is given as 1cm = _{j}_m. Find the actual distance in km for _{k}_ m shown on the map.
